text:
Hi everyone!
I am struggling with creating a template for a private app that I’ve built. I have set up the parameters, but when pushing the data into HubSpot, it does not apply the template. Anyone who has experience with this? Many thanks :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi All,
I’m creating a custom quote template. Is it possible to use personalization tokens from a custom object once the template has been created and made available?
Thanks in advance!
